14.<br>
```python
list=[]
for i in range(5):
    user=input("was wollen sie hinzufügen? ")
    list=list+[user]
    print(list)
```
15.<br>
```python
my_list = [3,12,3,5,3,4,6,8,5,3,5,6,3,2,4]
sum = 0
for i in range(len(my_list)): 
    sum= sum+my_list[i]
print(sum/len(my_list))
```
